Title: Drexel (No. 113)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Dave Metzger, Brandon Margolis (executive story editor), Brandon Sonnier (executive story editor), Brian Studler (executive story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: The owner of a tech startup is murdered in his own home by a man known only as "Drexel". He takes his time staging the body. Meanwhile Tom is rushed to hospital after sustaining two bullet wounds following the jewelry heist.
